library(plotly) # Learn about API authentication here: /r/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api model <- lm(mpg ~ wt + factor(cyl), data=mtcars) grid <- with(mtcars, expand.grid( wt = seq(min(wt), max(wt), length = 20), cyl = levels(factor(cyl)) )) grid$mpg <- stats::predict(model, newdata=grid) viz2 <- qplot(wt, mpg, data=mtcars, colour=factor(cyl)) + geom_line(data=grid) out <- py$ggplotly(viz2) plotly_url <- out$response$url
